job_details.Vacaturetitel: Big Data Engineer for AI Training
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
job_details.full_text:
Big Data Engineer for AI Training

Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using AI models to generate code and evaluating that code, rather than building, training, or deploying AI models. It lacks the core technical responsibilities of an ML or GenAI Engineer.

phrases: engaging with these models as they learn to code
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate interaction with and contribution to the training process of AI models, which falls under the modeling category, even if it's not direct algorithm development.

phrases: Crafting and answering questions related to computer science
job_tasks.justification: The role explicitly seeks experienced software engineers and coders, and the task of crafting questions requires programming and logical thinking, aligning with software development skills.

phrases: no requirement for previous AI experience
soft_skills.justification: This suggests the role is open to individuals who can learn and adapt to new AI concepts and tools.
The nature of the problems described implies a need for analytical and problem-solving skills to address variability and complexity.
